title: Camera colour correction is not perfect And bad photo quality
content:
-Color recognition is not accurate 
Eg: it show skin more yellow and dark in selfie camera
 -How to off Shutter sounds ?

-while takeing 10 min of video, phone get hot and video quality become worse 

-while taking many photos phone gets leg and photo shutter stops
 --while using camera app phone gets hotter 
And batter drain fast
